TECH.title: The Kubernetes Cluster I Shouldn't Have Built
TECH.description: A story about overengineering a simple scraping task with Kubernetes, and the lessons learned from it.

TECH.title: The Wrong Way to Code with AI (And the Right One)
TECH.description: My opinions and experience about where AI should and shouldn't be used in software development.

NON TECH.title: How not to be a "Smart-Dumb" person
NON TECH.description: My experience with really smart people who had dumb characteristics, and lessons learned.
